message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice, $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I think $100 is a bit low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $140.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $140 is still a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go up to $120. Let's see if we can close this deal.
I'm glad you're willing to meet me at $120, Bob, but I think I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to compromise at $130, but that's as low as I can go.
